docblock.description: Free result memory
docblock.long-description: Once the result is freed from memory the instance holding the result must not be used any further. This method is called automatically when the instance is released from memory.

tag.name: return
tag.description: Complete result information in a multi-dimensional array

tag.name: param
tag.description: The new RDN

tag.name: param
tag.description: The new parent/superior entry

tag.description:
If TRUE the old RDN value(s) are removed, else the old RDN

docblock.description: Search LDAP tree
docblock.long-description:
The scope of the operation is controlled by the $scope parameter, which can be one of:
self::SCOPE_SUBTREE - equivalent of ldap_search() (default) self::SCOPE_ONELEVEL - equivalent of ldap_list() self::SCOPE_BASE - equivalent of ldap_read()

tag.name: param
tag.description: The base DN for the directory

tag.name: param
tag.description: Ldap query filter (an empty filter is not allowed)

tag.name: param
tag.description:
An array of the required attributes, e.g. array("mail", "sn",

                         "cn")

tag.name: param
tag.description: One of self::SCOPE_SUBTREE, self::SCOPE_ONELEVEL or self::SCOPE_BASE

tag.name: param
tag.description: Should be set to 1 if only attribute types are wanted

tag.name: param
tag.description: Enables you to limit the count of entries fetched. Setting this to 0 means no limit

tag.name: param
tag.description: Sets the number of seconds how long is spend on the search. Setting this to 0 means no limit.

tag.name: param
tag.description: Specifies how aliases should be handled during the search

docblock.description: Set the value of the given option

tag.name: param
tag.description: An lDAP option constant

tag.name: param
tag.description: The new value for the option

docblock.description: Set a callback function to do re-binds on referral chasing

tag.name: fluent
tag.description: This method is part of a fluent interface and will return the same instance

tag.name: fluent
tag.description: This method is part of a fluent interface and will return the same instance

tag.name: param
tag.description: Arguments with which the method was called
